### ğŸ“š Features to Simplify Your Life

Zest offers a range of features to streamline your task management process:

- âœ¨ **Creating Categories:** Organize your tasks by creating categories that make sense to you.
- âœ… **Creating Tasks in Categories:** Add tasks within categories for a structured approach.
- ğŸ“‹ **Sorting of Tasks:** Easily categorize your tasks as completed or unfulfilled.
- ğŸ“¦ **Category Archiving:** Keep your workspace clean by archiving categories.
- ğŸ“Š **View Statistics:** Gain insights into your productivity with task statistics.
- ğŸ“† **View Tasks by Day:** Stay on top of daily tasks and deadlines.
- ğŸ“ **Editing:** Make changes to your tasks with ease.
- ğŸ”” **Notifications:** Receive reminders to never miss an important task.
- ğŸŒ **Localization:** Choose your preferred language from multiple options.
- ğŸ“‚ **Backup:** Safeguard your data with backup functionality.
- ğŸ”„ **Data Recovery:** Restore your information in case of mishaps.
- ğŸ—‘ï¸ **Delete All Data:** Clear your slate with a single button.
- ğŸ¨ **Beautiful Design**

Our app not only enhances productivity but also offers an intuitive and visually pleasing experience. Enjoy the best of both worlds!
